skills.skill: New Mexico Certification of Journeyman Electrician

duties_responsibilities.duty: Repair and maintain underground electrical systems
Install, Program, & Maintain Electronic control apparatus
Troubleshoot mechanical, electrical problems on belt line and high voltage distribution systems
Analyze, monitor and learn new processes and procedures
Perform physical tasks involving heavy lifting, stooping, bending, walking, shoveling, etc.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, post-secondary technical education, current Electrical Journeyman Licensed preferred, or New Mexico Certification of Journeyman Electrician
